name: website-from-design-to-code
description: A simple project to author a simple website from a given design.

scripts.lockfile-lint: lockfile-lint --allowed-hosts npm --allowed-schemes https: --empty-hostname false --type npm --path package-lock.json
scripts.watch-css-main: nodemon --watch index.html --watch ${npm_package_files_scss}/ --watch assets/javascript/ --ext scss --exec "npm-run-all css-lint css-compile css-purify css-prefix css-minify"
scripts.watch-css-no-lint: nodemon --watch index.html --watch ${npm_package_files_scss}/ --watch assets/javascript/ --ext scss --exec "npm-run-all css-compile css-purifyjs css-prefix css-minify"
scripts.watch-css-no-lint-purifyjs: nodemon --watch index.html --watch ${npm_package_files_scss}/ --watch assets/javascript/ --ext scss --exec "npm-run-all css-compile css-purifyjs css-prefix css-minify"
scripts.watch-css-no-lint-no-purify: nodemon --watch index.html --watch ${npm_package_files_scss}/ --watch assets/javascript/ --ext scss --exec "npm-run-all css-compile css-prefix css-minify"

author: Georg Gentzen
